General.Name: PT Sigma Energy Compressindo T
General.Description: PT Sigma Energy Compressindo Tbk, a service company, provides equipment rental services for the monetization of oil and gas industry. It also engages in fuel trading business; and the rental of gasjack compressors. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Sigma Energy Compressindo Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Sigma Energy Utama.
General.Address: GKM Green Tower, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12520
